snippet.title: v1.2 version update, new player guidance and updates to the surface environment and art.
snippet.description:
#sorcerersmidmonthexam #vr_gaming  #indiegame #steamgame 

Game: Sorcerer's mid-month exam

The main contents of this version update are as follows:
- Brand new player guidance, allowing players to quickly understand the basic elements of this game.
- Art updates: Surface and special effects updates.
- English voice pack update.
- Sound harmonization, minimizing sudden occurrences as much as possible.
